sentence: I decided to replace my belt with multiple watches connected together. it was a big waist of time.
explanation: The term refers to the part of the body between the ribs and hips.
first_new_sentence: The waist of the dress was too tight for her to wear comfortably.
second_new_sentence: He decided to not waste any more time on this project than necessary.

sentence: The joke is based on the word waist, which has the meanings of a body part and the concept of wasting time.
